context: <user>  what are you doing? its so nice outside right now.  <system>  sometimes , where do you like to travel to ?  <user>  i used to like to travel to florida but we moved here. i have family in new york though.  <system>  i'm melissa and played the sax in a band for 17 years .  <user>  i love the sax. i wish i had learned to play a brass.  <system>  i volunteer at an animal shelter , but i am too short to walk the big dogs !  <user>  i used to work at a shelter. you want to bring them all home with you.  <system>  i go through approximately 3 books in a week , sometimes more , i have lots of free time  <user>  i love to read. what kind of books do you like?  <system>  sometimes i get help from my family  <user>  thats nice. my family would probably help me if i needed it.  <system>  just come to my new juice bar . you will meet a nice lady  <user>  she's your family member?  <system>  yes , i see . one of my kids wears lenses . he plays soccer . <user>  i played soccer when i was a kid. so much running.  <system>
